nodes.text: Carving the Republic: The Real Story of Count Dooku

Carving the Republic: The Real Story of Count Dooku was a book for sale in 23 BBY. The work concerned Count Dooku, a Jedi Master who resigned from the Jedi Order and helped found a militant confederacy of planets that wished to secede from the Galactic Republic. Carving the Republic was written by Andevor Javin and, for a time, it was the number one best-selling book, according to the CoCo Town Edition of the HoloNet News.

A ranking of the five best-selling books, from 23 BBY, including the number-one ranked Carving the Republic, appeared in HoloNet News Vol. 531 45 (2002), an in-universe website created to publicize the upcoming Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones film.
